name: Dodge The Gobs
description:
Dodge The Gobs is a simple game I made using the godot game engine, for learning and testing purposes. (this game is also on gamejolt.com)

Dodge the gobs or die. Those are the only choices you have in this cruel world of goblins.

There's an easter egg. Click everything and click a lot.

/////CREDITS/////

Game by - Silver Ghost Games

Music by - Kevin MacLeod
